p: Recently, Y. Wang et al. reported randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial in hospitalized adults with severe COVID-19 in China. Adverse effects such as constipation, hypoalbuminemia, hypokalemia, anemia, and thrombocytopenia as well as increased total bilirubin concentrations were reported in 66 % of patients who received RemdesivirÂ®. Serious adverse events reported in 18 %, and drug discontinued because of the adverse events [ 16].
